strings.s: Hey... Look at that big crack in the wall... I think I can enter the village through it...
It might be dangerous, ... We can't see what's in the other side of the wall...
What? Do you think they'll have a crocodile pit or something like that on the other side?
Well... Not exactly this, but...
I appreciate your concerns... But I can't hear nothing dangerous from here... And I really need to get in...
JUMP OVER THE CRACK
NOT NOW
No time to waste... Let's do this
... Do you copy? Are you sure about this?
Yes... The surroundings looks clear from here...
I'm in...
Any crocodiles around?
Very funny... As I said, there are no threaths around and...
Wait...
Oh no...
What the fuck you think you're doing, girl?
I... I couldn't find the entrance to the village... and then... I... I...
You are in serious trouble... The village is under curfew and we don't tolerate sneaky people trying to get in or out...
Doing some time in our criminal depot might teach something about respecting the law...
No please... I'm sorry...
Stop stalling... Come... Now!
Girl... _This... is... not... cool... _
Yeah... Let us both be girls now, you bugger...
Damn... I felt his pain all the way over here...
Thanks for the tip, ... Now, let's go into the village!
Stupid bitch... Did you really thought you could pull that trick on me? I hope this teached you some respect...
Sleep, now...
_When you wake up, you'll be already living in your new home..._
You won't find nothing but dense jungle down this way, ...
Thanks for the warning, ...
